articles.title: Hijab row: Supreme Court issues notice to Karnataka govt over plea challenging HC's order - The Indian Express
articles.description: Several petitions have been filed in the Supreme Court against the Karnataka High Court verdict holding that wearing of hijab is not a part of the essential religious practice.
articles.content: The Supreme Court on Monday issued notice to the Karnataka government over a plea challenging the High Court’s order upholding a ban on hijab in educational institutions of the state.
